feed.title: Proposal to stop processing of unrequested transactions in Bitcoin Core

entry.title: Proposal to stop processing of unrequested transactions in Bitcoin Core
entry.summary: In a discussion about a potential change in behavior when issuing a getdata request, Pieter expressed uncertainty about the privacy implications of such a change. He requested more information on why this is not a concern. It is unclear what specific privacy concern Pieter is referring to, and the other party in the discussion asked for clarification.
